0101000110011110 0111110011100101 1 -> sum: 1100111010000100, cout: 0
0010001110101111 1100111010011000 0 -> sum: 1111001001000111, cout: 0
1111000110101011 1110010101011010 1 -> sum: 1101011100000110, cout: 1

1001000001100100 0010101001011001 1 -> sum: 1011101010111110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
